I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
lem = fix lem (m0 m1 : Map bool) {struct m1} : Prop := match m0 with | @M0 _ => match m1 with | @M0 _ => True | _ => False end | @M1 _ a b => match m1 with | @M1 _ a' b' => if (a =? a')%N then leb b b' else False | _ => False end | @M2 _ a b => match m1 with | @M2 _ c d => lem a c /\ lem b d | _ => False end end : Map bool -> Map bool -> Prop

map_or = fix map_or (m0 m1 : Map bool) {struct m1} : Map bool := match m0 with | @M0 _ => M0 bool | @M1 _ a0 b0 => match m1 with | @M1 _ a1 b1 => if (a0 =? a1)%N then M1 bool a0 (b0 || b1) else M0 bool | _ => M0 bool end | @M2 _ x0 y0 => match m1 with | @M2 _ x1 y1 => M2 bool (map_or x0 x1) (map_or y0 y1) | _ => M0 bool end end : Map bool -> Map bool -> Map bool
map_mini_mapget_false : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (a : ad) (b : bool), MapGet bool (map_mini A x) a = Some b -> b = false

Nltb_double_plus_one_mono_conv : forall a b : N, Nleb (N.succ_double a) (N.succ_double b) = false -> Nleb a b = false

map_maxi_maxi : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), maxi bool lem (ensemble_base A x) (map_maxi A x)

lattice_bounded : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), bounded_sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A x) lem (S (MapCard A x))
Map_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Type), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m

``` 
intros m0 m1 a b H.
unfold lem in H.
unfold map_replace.
destruct m0, m1; simpl; try split; try contradiction.
- destruct (a =? a0)%N; simpl; trivial.
  destruct (a =? a0)%N; simpl in H; contradiction.
- destruct (a =? a0)%N; simpl in H; destruct H; rewrite H, H0; trivial.
- destruct (a =? a0)%N; simpl; trivial.
```
